text: <@U1JB7QCBD>: the node tests are run when you run 'make node-sdk-unit-tests’ or any make target that has that as a dependency
cbf: The problem is that on windows *host* I can not even run `npm install` in the vagrant box because it does not support symlinks
so I am quite stuck with this, maybe I need a different machine to test this on
no, not personally, but this is quite well known: <https://github.com/npm/npm/issues/9901>

text: I didn’t mean against npm but against the fabric
if this is blocking, then an issue will help me escalate and get someone to provide a work around
I am not confident in anything really, I am just one random person hacking around. Maybe there is a workaround that I am not aware of
if I will be confident enough, I will open an issue, I promise
if you are having an issue, then it is a problem
please document in an issue and PM me with the number and I can have someone take a closer look
